name: RainCatcher
description:
This is a game I made with my kids in 48 hours for 'rain jam'!

2 players, 1 keyboard, 1 minute drop catching - enjoy!

Controls Player1

  • left : key A
  • right: key D
  • jump: key W

Controls Player2

  • left : left arrow
  • right: right arrow
  • jump: up arrow
